summary: The sword of the Knight of Chains.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is my version of Karsa Orlong’s sword, which he made out of a pillar of flint, from the Malazan Book of the Fallen series.  You can’t really get more badass than Karsa Orlong.  I mean come on he made his own sword out of a giant hunk of stone and then used it to crush his former “gods.”  And that’s not even the most badass thing he’s done, it was really just Thursday.

I only recently decided to make mods and I figured making a weapon was as simple as you could get, so here it is.  I’m still learning the work flow and ways of getting around some of the programs that are new to me so if there are any problems let me know and I’ll try to fix em.

You can find it through the console with help karsa 4 or craft it like any other sword if you have daedric smithing.  It might be a bit overpowered but I figured that was alright since two-handers tend to suffer a bit in the end game anyway, and its pretty heavy.

(edit: I messed up the archive a bit and caused the sword to not appear but it should be fixed now.  Please grab the tex fix file.  Sorry!)
author: DangerousHerb

files.name: Karsa Orlong Flint Sword tex fix
